attributes.action: Direct local planners to pass applications for 'green' energy sources by homeowners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the Government are persuing a 'green' initiative, it is an absolute nonsence for local planners to refuse planning applications from homeowners for small wind generators, and solar panels etc. on the very subjective grounds of appearance or noise. The conservation of our planet and its resources easily outranks ANY other issue and must be our prime objective.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
